alert.note: Alert for Mifflin (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued November 11 at 11:27PM EST by NWS State College
info.description: ...A GUSTY SHOWER WILL IMPACT NORTHEASTERN HUNTINGDON AND SOUTHWESTERN MIFFLIN COUNTIES THROUGH MIDNIGHT EST... At 1127 PM EST, Doppler radar was tracking a gusty shower near Huntingdon, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Lewistown, Mount Union, Burnham, Belleville, Milroy, Highland Park, Yeagertown, Strodes Mills, Reedsville, Juniata Terrace, Allensville, Mcalevys Fort, Mapleton, McVeytown, Mill Creek, Kistler, Longfellow, Newton Hamilton, Atkinson Mills and Barrville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Very heavy rainfall is also occurring with this gusty shower and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
